revised_title: Resonant Satellite Orbits and Geopotential Harmonics
tldr: The authors analyze resonant satellite orbits and their effects on geopotential harmonics. They provide explicit forms for the rates of change of inclination and eccentricity at common resonances, using a standardized notation and evaluating two subsidiary functions. This analysis has led to the most accurate values available for lumped geopotential harmonics of relevant orders.
